quest.name: Supply and Demands
journal: Dadanen would like you to deliver a message to Copperbell Mines.
Dadanen has yet to receive a delivery from Copperbell Mines, and his patience is wearing thin. Deliver his notice to Drunken Stag, the miner whom he hired to deliver his product.
Drunken Stag is powerless to act, as the mines have been closed due to an incident in the depths. However, he did mention losing a haul not far from here...
objectives: Deliver Dadanen's final notice to Drunken Stag.

dialogue.name: DADANEN
dialogue.text: It so happens that I've a situation that must be resolved posthaste─and I do mean posthaste.

dialogue.name: DADANEN
dialogue.text: I'm plumb out of premium product, and my latest order has yet to arrive! If I keep my customers waiting any longer, this could irrevocably damage my reputation!

dialogue.name: DADANEN
dialogue.text: What's worse, I paid my man in advance for his services. Despite his assurances that it would be a simple affair, I've heard nothing since he departed for Copperbell Mines days ago.

dialogue.name: DADANEN
dialogue.text: Find Drunken Stag and give him this notice. I cannot afford any further delay.

dialogue.name: DRUNKENSTAG
dialogue.text: What do you want? Hm? Dadanen's product?

dialogue.name: DRUNKENSTAG
dialogue.text: He can send all the notices he likes, but it won't change a thing.

dialogue.name: DRUNKENSTAG
dialogue.text: The Concern has closed the mines due to some incident in the depths.

dialogue.name: DRUNKENSTAG
dialogue.text: It's a godsdamned shame too─lost a decent haul just over yonder during all the chaos...
